name: Crypto Threads
description: Why CryptoThreads? Keeping up with everything going on in crypto is hard. Finding adequate sources leads users down a rabbit hole of scattered information and piecing it all together is tedious and insanely time-consuming. Here comes CryptoThreads! Gone are the times of searching for charts, new launches, alpha and token info all over the internet. The one-stop shop for anything crypto. Stay Ahead - 100% Revenue Share It's all about timing and flow of information. With our solution you can stay ahead of the curve and never miss a trend. Trending Pairs, Live Token Tracker, and much more all while you are scrolling through alpha. But that is not enough! We are delighted to say our revenue share program will distribute all revenue from the platform to holders, creators and stakers. Power & profit back to the people that make this platform great.
